mean_cn: n. 再演唱的要求，经要求而再唱；  v. 要求再演或唱；  int. 再来一个
mean_en: used by an audience to call for another song, dance, etc., when a performance has ended
short_phrase: play an encore after the performance
sentence: The guitarist came back onstage to give a wonderful encore performance.
sentence_trans: 吉他手重返舞台，加了个漂亮的返场作为加额外节目。
